item.title: 【HD Live Performances】BOOTLEG - Madonna - The Celebration Tour In Rio (fixed and enhanced)
item.description:
Madonna - The Celebration Tour In Rio (fixed and enhanced)
Genre : Pop
Duration : 134:09
Year of release : 2024
Description : Madonna's record-breaking concert took place on Copacabana Beach on May 4, 2024 in front of 1.6 million people.
Tracklist : Act I
It's a Celebration (with Bob the Drag Queen) (Bob the Drag Queen; "D&D", "Lucky Star", "Celebration", "Erotica", "Vogue", "BIM" & "Material Girl")
Nothing Really Matters (contains elements from the Club 69 Remix)
Everybody (contains elements of "Where's the Party")
Into the Groove (contains elements of "Into the Hollywood Groove")
Burning Up
Open Your Heart
Holiday (contains elements of "I Want" "Your Love" by Chic)
Act II
The Storm (contains elements of "In This Life")
Live to Tell
The Ritual (Dancers interlude; contains elements of "Girl Gone Wild")
Like a Prayer (contains elements of "Birjina Gaztetto Bat Zegoen", "Unholy", "Girl Gone Wild" & "Act of Contrition")
Act III
Living for Love (contains elements of the Offer Nissim Remix, Prince's “Let's Go Crazy” & Eddie Copley's “Fever”)
Erotica (contains elements of "Justify My Love", "You Thrill Me" & "Papa Don't Preach" " ")
Justify My Love (contains elements of Kehlani's "Gangsta", Peggy Lee's "Fever" & "Erotica")
Hung Up (contains elements of Hung Up on Tokischa)
Bad Girl (contains elements of Charles Mayer's "Le Regret, op. 332", Mercy James on piano)
Act IV
Ballroom (dancers interlude; contains elements of "Up Down Suite", "Vogue" & BREAK MY SOUL (THE QUEENS REMIX))
Vogue (with Anitta)
Human Nature (Shortened)
Crazy for You (Shortened)
Act V
The Beast Within (contains elements of "Justify My Love")
Die Another Day
Don't Tell Me (contains elements of "The Good, the Bad & the Ugly")
This Little Light of Mine (Acapella snippet)
Express Yourself ( Acoustic; extended outro)
La Isla Bonita
Music (with Pabllo Vittar) (Also with young musicians from Rio different samba schools - Tour debut. Samba version)
Act VI
Madonna (video interlude; contains elements of "I Don't Search I Find")
Bedtime Story (contains elements of the Sound Factory Remix)
Ray of Light (Sasha Ultra Violet Remix)
Rain
Act VII
Billie Jean / Like a Virgin (contains elements of Express Yourself, Angel & Smooth Criminal, Dangerous, YRMW, TWYMMF by MJ)
Bitch I'm Madonna (contains elements of "Give Me All Your Luvin")
Celebration (shortened instrumental outro ; contains elements of “Music”;
Add. information : The difference from other distributions is that this one has louder and higher quality sound, there is no logo, and some crashes that occurred in the live broadcast have been fixed.
Quality : HDTVRip
Video resolution/scan : 1080p
Container : MP4
Video codec : H.264
Audio codec : AAC
Video : H264, 1920x1080p, 11068kbps, 29.97fps
Audio : AAC, 509kbps, 48000kHz, 2ch

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
item.author: brunomarsfan
